website_summaries.verdict: Prime it, set it, and forget it with this multipurpose priming water.
pros: Hydrating mist works as a primer and a setting spray
Lightweight formula leaves skin soft and doesn’t pill under foundation
Keeps makeup in place for hours
cons: Primer has a strong fragrance that may not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! A HOLY GRAIL ITEM!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super light-weight! It really does feel like water on the skin! Refreshing and hydrating, not thick or slick or greasy. I don't know if it actually helps foundation stay on longer, but it does help create a great canvas for makeup without the thickness of silicone based primers. It has also helped minimize the appearance of my pores. I am enjoying using this product. It also works great as a mid or late day foundation pick me up, and also helps powder foundation look less powdery on the skin...less dry/matte. Gives great luminosity when lightly sprayed over foundation.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly mackay

customer_reviews.title: Beware !!😡
customer_reviews.text: Beware!! This is fake primer. Not original one. Think when you buy prime. I m very sad. Don't waste money for this.
customer_reviews.author: Kalpesh Shinde

customer_reviews.title: A product "must" in your make-up bag! Seriously great primer
customer_reviews.text: I am menopausal with acne prone skin - fun!! This is my "go-to" primer - when I don't use it, I notice my make-up comes off midday. It doesn't make me break out and it adds zero weight to the product load on my face, and I HATE heavy feeling make-up. My make-up bag staple.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as store bought.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not convinced this particular order was the real deal. I have used this primer water purchased at ultra with completely different results. I have oily skin which is why I love it for primer. Typically it is excellent. I suspect this order was counterfeit? Totally different results. Zero results to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: deeanna

customer_reviews.title: I really like this water
customer_reviews.text: I really like this water. The smell is great and it seems to help set my makeup in the morning right before I leave for work. I can definitely tell a difference when I forget to put it on in the morning. It is like a fine setting mist that smells great and is very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sets your makeup
customer_reviews.text: I use this to set my makeup and it gives that airbrush look and softens all of your makeup. Goes on like a fine mist and dries in a few seconds. I noticed that it actually changes the color of my lipstick--lightens it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: its more like scented water
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as a primer...its more like scented water. If you are curious, try it from stores at first before getting one from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: playlist

customer_reviews.title: Necessary Product?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how necessary this is. My skin doesn't feel very good after using it...Odd sensation for me. I have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: My staple in looking fresh and it does help keep my make up stay on longer - not all day as I only sprayed it once after my makeup in the am. I have combination skin too. I ordered this a while ago and I still have half the bottle left, Highly recommend. It helps with my pores as well. Picture ready perfect. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: LC-NEWPORT BCH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome primer for summertime!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the summer! The gel/cream primers make my skin look and feel too greasy on hot and humid days. This primer water spray is perfect because it's extremely light, doesn't make my skin look or feel greasy at all, and works just as well as a gel primer (in my opinion). I will absolutely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B.

customer_reviews.title: Best primer and refresher for your makeup!
customer_reviews.text: Best primer ever!! I will never go back to Urban decay all nighter spray again!;
customer_reviews.author: MuAddict

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite primer! My foundation stays on for hours! I like this idea because I don't really like touching my face more than I have to when applying makeup. It's easy to use, hydrates my face and can be used even later in the day as a mist.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite setting sprays
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite setting sprays. I can't say enough good things about Smashbox Primer water. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: davikzca

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Need a bigger bottle if you use as everyday use or two
customer_reviews.author: Milani Exo

customer_reviews.title: Great as primer & setting spray
customer_reviews.text: My favorite beauty tool! Keeps my face matte & holds my makeup in place
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Okay Spray
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Provided base for makeup, provided setting makeup afterwards, nice mist Cons: Made skin look a little too oily (might just be my skin type), made my pores bigger, smells okay, expensive, doesn't last that long
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Tiny for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It does its job. Though I honestly have 200 dollar perfume that's bigger......
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: this honestly does as much as spraying water on your face lol. save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not feel that this product met the hype ...... I used as directed and yet it just did not work as well as other products
customer_reviews.author: BMAC

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product.. I use it before my primer and then the foundation and then to finish the look I spray some more.. can't live with out it..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works all day... Even fell asleep with my makeup on and it held the makeup on place all night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Will definitely be ordering more. I use in combination with a matte foundation, and couldn't be happier. Definitely recommend. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this and the smell of it
customer_reviews.text: Love this 4 promer in the summer with mac cosmetics products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My goal with this was to get a matte finish ...
customer_reviews.text: My goal with this was to get a matte finish to my makeup that would last the day. This did help my makeup last, but it was a glowy, shinier finish than I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Not fake, for those wondering.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it might've been a fake at first, because when I bought it, it was so cheap! I've been using it for a while and it's 100% real. And I love it! Favorite primer ever.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love this primer water
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer water. It adds hydrogenation to my face. My makeup stays in place, although my skin type is oily, I dont like uses this as my setting spray everyday because I want a matter look sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Load of crap
customer_reviews.text: This picture shows the full size bottle and when I received my package I got the travel size!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie ekezie

customer_reviews.title: No other primer like this one.
customer_reviews.text: Best primer ever. You don't have to worry about it being too heavy or greasy under your foundation. Not to mention it really does the job. I noticed a huge difference when I ran out and couldn't use it
customer_reviews.author: eavy

customer_reviews.title: not the best makeup base or fixation
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, not the best makeup base or fixation, It kind of make my skin oily..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not convinced this particular order was the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Moiz Anis

customer_reviews.title: If you have oily skin it doesn’t set well
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, doesn’t really set your make up well if you have oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: I will never doubt again.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I have tried other primers in the past, none with the name recognition of Smashbox. I just couldn't bring myself to spend more than $10 on a primer. Man, was I wrong! This primer leaves my skin looking flawless, and the longevity of my makeup is astounding. Totally worth spending just a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Hale

customer_reviews.title: this spray gud
customer_reviews.text: this spray so good jesus came in my room. this spray so good i got a big bucket of chicken. this spray so good my knees aint even ashy no mo
customer_reviews.author: bill fleming

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Lasts so long! And so good! Love it! Had it for the longest time! Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but does not provide oil control
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but not for oily skin. It did not help with oil control at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Lily

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best beauty products I've ever tried in my life
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best beauty products I've ever tried in my life. My skin is acne prone but this doesn't irritate it. My skin glows and this is great for someone who doesn't like the thick primers. Plus it's super fast to apply and keeps skin nicely hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The best I can say is it is okay. I use it occasionally but can't tell much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvMyFire

customer_reviews.title: This does not compare to Urban Decay ... Not worth the $45 bucks for Primer Water. UrbAn Decay is no.1
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Smashbox ! But I was let down on quality of product itself. This does not compare to Urban Decay. I will not repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my "go to" daily products
customer_reviews.text: Great for setting my makeup or to refresh it after a long day
customer_reviews.author: jcgore

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I use before and after foundation. Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected this primer gives a natural and fresh look after makeup and for retouching!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I work 12+ hour shifts running around a hospital and my make up looks great afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: lostgirl88

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products!!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all of the five star reviews. This product is a must in my everyday makeup routine, it makes my skin look fresh and flawless all day. The shipping was quick and easy. I will be ordering from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Silicone-free Primer Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would buy Primer water. I have been on a search for silicone free primer that works. Here it is at last! I only have to apply once and it is long lasting and hold your makeup and In the hot climate that I live in, My face rarely sweats with this. I have oily skin and now my oil does not come through. My nose is shiny no more! I look flawless! Hurray!
customer_reviews.author: thecharmedone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my makeup looking fresh all day. I dont know how i ever lived without it!
customer_reviews.author: Alallen

customer_reviews.title: strong smell
customer_reviews.text: A bit to strong of a fragrance for me. But set my makeup nicely
customer_reviews.author: Hana Shirey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this product. I put it on right before foundation and my pore less primer. Love this stuff to death!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: One of my favourite go to products when I apply makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have no regrets purchasing the primer water. One of my favourite go to products when I apply makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Nickie jose

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Box was mangled.. bottle was not sealed.. afraid I got fake product
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Does absolutely nothing as far as a primer or a setting spray. Nothing. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to any makeup bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. It's so easy to order off of Amazon and I love that it's a cheaper price. I first got a little bottle to try it but I ended up using it every day. It really works!! I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great staying power
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first bottle I have bought. I love that I just need to spray it on after my moisturizer and sunscreen in the morning and let it dry (only takes a minute but I put my earrings and necklace on in that time so I dont feel like it is wasted time) and it keeps my make up in place and my skin ungreasy all day. My first bottle was travel size 1/4 of this one and it lasted about 5.5 months so I'm anticipating this one lasting even longer. Bonus to it being a spray - no way of contaminating it like other make up can be.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Casey

customer_reviews.title: My wife bought this primer, and she loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this primer, and she loves it! When she's finish with this one, she will order another one. 😊
customer_reviews.author: RONNIE THAETER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such an underrated product, has quickly become a staple for my makeup routine.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase, primer water is great
customer_reviews.text: I knew what to expect, and it arrived per my expectations. Will buy again. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on cheaper primers. This products keep my makeup in place even as my face becomes oily later in the day - and even with hot, humid temperatures. Goes on nicely and completely undetectable .
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok but I'll keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. Its hydrating and does set my makeup minimally. Doesnt really do what I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Metro

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you'd expect. Doesn't feel sticky or anything like that. Sprays nicely. I can't really compare it to other primers since this is the first one I've used.
customer_reviews.author: RochelleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even get what I BOUGHT! This is .50 fl. Oz! And it isn't even primer water. It's just primer. Don't get this!
customer_reviews.author: Kyrstin

customer_reviews.title: Growing Obsession
customer_reviews.text: I've used a sample and just had to come back for the full sized bottle. It's almost as if I can't fully explain what this product does for me, but I just know my face and makeup needs it lol. It just makes it all better.
customer_reviews.author: Kita

customer_reviews.title: This product actually works!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my makeup in place all day and stops powder from looking cakey and heavy. I will definitely be buying this again. I apply this before makeup application and after makeup application and sometimes use it to touch up during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Collins

customer_reviews.title: Expensive water. Not sure if I notice a difference ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive water. Not sure if I notice a difference as I haven't paid much attention. I have replaced my Mac prep and prime with it. This can be used with silicone based primers as the prep and prime cannot.
customer_reviews.author: CMack

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good product but very expensive for the size of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Collins

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This product was ok. I bought this with the expectation it would help control the oiliness of my skin and keep my tinted moisturizer from sliding off throughout the day. This product, for me did absolutely nothing. I happened to give this product to a friend and they have raved about it hence me not giving it 1 star. For the price, I was surprised how small this product is, but I guess it is typical with all makeup products that just try to make money off consumers.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Pointless and expensive
customer_reviews.text: Completely pointless product, it literally does nothing, except it feels good for a few seconds. Also broke out my normal skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package was opened and clearly retaped shut!
customer_reviews.text: This package has clearly been opened before, and taped back up. And they did a horrible job at trying to even pass this off as new. Tape is literally going in every direction on this. Im not sure of the authenticity of the primer water, Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep710

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Used the original Smashbox primer forever and was a little skeptical. I was wrong- it's awesome! It's almost impossibly light and just as effective as the gel version. It seems like it will last much longer than the old school primer as I have to use so little. Can also be used to easily touch up without looking cakey or obvious. If I could give it 6 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Dickmann

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect primer! For days when I don't feel like having too much makeup on this is perfect. I can get a light priming affect and not be weighed down. I also use this as setting spray sometimes as well. Works great for both! Hides my pores and allows for my foundation to glide right on my face. I also love that I don;'t get my forehead crease as much when I use this primer vs other primers. Great job Smashbox, as always!
customer_reviews.author: nekeia hilton

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, a Holy Grail product!
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm fairly new to using primer waters and setting sprays, I currently consider the Smashbox Photo Finish Primer Water to be my holy grail. It keeps my makeup in place for 12+ hours. I first spray it on before using a regular primer and then as a setting spray when I'm done. It doesn't have much of a scent which I appreciate. If I don't use it, I don't feel fully put together.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyMortimerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: but it almost looks like it's already been used a few times because it ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come in any packaging and I'm not sure if it's supposed to , but it almost looks like it's already been used a few times because it wasnt all the way full but all in all its a really good product
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY DO LOVE THIS PRODUCT. I DO NOT KNOW IF IT REALLY GIVES ME A PHOTO FINISH BUT IT WORKS GREAT AS A PRIMER AND SETTING SPRAY. MY MAKE UP LOOKS REALLY GOOD EVERY TIME I USE THIS PRODUCT.MY MAKE UP DOES NOT BUDGE ALL DAY LONG WITH THIS ON. DEF IF I GO OUTSIDE AND ITS HOT AND SPRAY SOME OF THIS ON ITS VERY REFRESHING. I NEED MORE ALREADY AND I WISH IT CAME IN A BIGGER SPRAY BOTTLE. LOVE THIS ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I have oily skin so this makes a difference when ...
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin so this makes a difference when I wear makeup. I use this product in conjunction with the photo finish foundation primer. I spray the primer water first then add the primer to my t zone. My makeup stays put considerably longer than what I've noticed with other primers and primer waters.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: This seemed to make me to shiny and oily. ...
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to make me to shiny and oily. I bought it because of a referral from a friend, however, maybe it's more for people with dry skin, not normal to oily. Unless I am using it incorrectly. I spray it over my makeup when I finish applying it. I will try it under my makeup and see if that works but so far makes me look to oily.
customer_reviews.author: LadyRichie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Primer Spray, Very Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer! It refreshes my face and it gives me a nice fresh faced glow. I have to keep this stuff in my cabinet. I actually place it in my refrigerator to keep the product cool. It feels amazing against your skin and a little bit goes a long way. Perfect way to prep your face for makeup application or to just give yourself a fresh spritz throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: IamShaniSlay

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is not the real deal. Although it looks similar the bottle has a few differences. Go to Ulta or Sephora and you will see the difference. So disappointing as you don’t know what is going into a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Never buy another brand!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on and off for months. I always try a cheaper brand and end up coming back to this one! I have zero complaints on this Primer Water! It's hands down the best out there! Just fork over the money, just a couple sprays is all you need, don't waste it.
customer_reviews.author: ShellYeah

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing... keeps makeup on for longer periods of time and it gives the face a glowey dewy finish
customer_reviews.author: Shalom Ezeokeh

customer_reviews.title: Keeps make up in place (even in the rain for me!!)
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with Smashbox's primer water. My girlfriend and I got caught in the rain (wish it were more romantic but instead it was just gross and we were on our way to a party:( ) and while her makeup melted off, mine was still in pretty darn good condition. I couldn't believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: A must have! Kept my make up looking fresh even after 12 hour flight, 5 hour drive and zero sleep! Spray before make up and after and in between when you need to freshen up a bit!
customer_reviews.author: christian p

customer_reviews.title: You are kidding yourself if you think this does anything.
customer_reviews.text: Four of us have tried this item, females of all skin types and we all have different make up routines. Not one of us can notice anything different when using this product. Wasted money. Mist some water on your face, its the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C

customer_reviews.title: Good accident
customer_reviews.text: I actually accidentally ordered this and ended up loving it! It works really well, goes on evenly and feels really good on my skin after I get warm from blow drying my hair
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this water primer! I can tell a difference when I use it in the longevity of my makeup. I also loves how it feels. Like water! :) because it is water based it seems to go quickly...so I only use it on days I need my makeup to last 8+ hours on a day, going out, etc.
customer_reviews.author: R. Staples

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I never use any type of primer for my face because primers make me break out. I heard about this product through Jaclyn Hill on YouTube and so far everything she has recommened that I bought has worked out perfect. I have used it everyday for about a month now and no breakouts! Holds my makeup together making it last all day! Also, keeps my face looking hydrated (huge plus). Recommend 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Bowie B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Didn't think it would really make a difference ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow. Amazing. Didn't think it would really make a difference but it made a a HUGE DIFFERENCE. Must buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great all day long
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use Just a squirt on my face, and it dries almost instantly My make up looks fantastic all day long
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This primer makes my makeup stay put and adds a healthy glow to my face. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Salad

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my Collection
customer_reviews.text: This stuff if a perfect addition to my collection. I use it as a setting spray when I do a full face (usually after I put on my foundation and my highlighter, concealer, etc) and if I'm in a hurry it's my base primer under my bb cream. In the picture I posted, it had been about 10 hours since I had put on my makeup and it looks like I had just put it on. I am afraid I'm going to waste a lot since it is a spray but it's still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Better as a finishing spray than a primer in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Better as a finishing spray than a primer in my opinion. I love the way my skin looks after spraying this on makeup but I don't see much difference when I use it as a primer.
customer_reviews.author: KARL23

customer_reviews.title: I like the Smashbox photo finish primer best for special events
customer_reviews.text: Makes my make foundation last all day. I like the Smashbox photo finish primer best for special events, but I use this mist for my every day make up and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: ERulli

customer_reviews.title: Beyonce is that you?!
customer_reviews.text: Wife says 6 stars!!!!! I say 10 stars bc she be slaying these you know what's!
customer_reviews.author: joelduh0517

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy it again, takes too long to dry
customer_reviews.text: I like it but my makeup is still not set after a few hours
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great primer!
customer_reviews.text: Great primer and easy to use! Has nice smell and did not cause irritation, I really like how it made my makeup look after I had primed my face with the primer water. Feels light on face. Affordable price would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It works really well as a primer and doesn’t rub off when applying foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie Fleig

customer_reviews.title: It has a lovely aroma and my make up looked fantastic at the end of the day-even at Disneyland
customer_reviews.text: Used the primer on my wedding day and during my honeymoon. It has a lovely aroma and my make up looked fantastic at the end of the day-even at Disneyland!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this. It'll just make you oiler
customer_reviews.text: If you have oily skin, I would not recommend this. It'll just make you oiler.
customer_reviews.author: Lockerpunch

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a makeup artist. I do very basic (powder foundation, blush, eyebrows, eye shadow and eyeliner) everyday makeup, and this spray works for me. I love it. Keeps my makeup intact the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through several bottles of this. It is a must before applying any other primers or foundations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I feel like it helps keeps my makeup on!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: developed contact lens sensitivity - may not be for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Oh là là

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great primer for my skin, dry to normal. Super hydrating and smells good!
customer_reviews.author: OZ

product_meta.title: Smashbox Photo Finish Primer Water, 3.9 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:3.9 Fluid OunceThis 3-in-1 face primer and makeup setting spray hydrates, preps and refreshes skin. It instantly absorbs into skin for lasting hydration, leaving it looking ultra-soft. It delivers revitalizing electrolytes that reawaken skin and restore moisture.
feature_bullets: It worked well with their skin tone.
